definition[0]: the weight of the materials in which goods are packed
definition[1]: the weight of an unloaded vehicle, used to calculate the actual weight of the goods in it
definition[2]: the weight of the material in which goods are packed or wrapped
definition[3]: the weight of an unloaded goods vehicle, taken away from its loaded weight to calculate the weight of the goods it is carrying
example[0]: Truck drivers must keep their own records of tare weighings carried out.
